DOC.brief_summary: Direct Anterior Approach (DAA) for Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA): Corail prosthesis with or without collar design. Randomized study design focusing on radiolucent lines on standard x-ray.
DOC.brief_title: Direct Anterior Approach (DAA) for Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA): Corail Prosthesis With or Without Collar Design
